labels.name: Name
labels.linked-stores: Linked stores (Customers can use theirs credentials here)

placeholders.name: Enter name
placeholders.linked-stores: This store has no linked stores

descriptions.code: Will use as Store primary key and in storefront as part of url for store selection
descriptions.name: Display name for store to represent in manager
descriptions.catalog: A physical or virtual catalog associated with this store

store-delete.title: Delete confirmation
store-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this Store?

store-save.title: Save changes
store-save.message: The Store has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

tax-provider-save.title: Save changes
tax-provider-save.message: The Tax provider has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

permissions.store:loginOnBehalf: Login on behalf of a customer

States.title: States
States.description: States that a store can be in

TaxCalculationEnabled.title: Enable Tax Calculation
TaxCalculationEnabled.description: Setting to off prevents tax calculation on storefront

AllowAnonymousUsers.title: Allow anonymous user for store
AllowAnonymousUsers.description: Set to false to prevent anonymous user access to store

IsSpa.title: Is SPA
IsSpa.description: Flag indicates that store is a SPA application

SeoLinksType.title: SEO Links
SeoLinksType.description: Determines how to generate links for products and categories. Long: /virtual-parent-category/physical-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product, Collapsed: /virtual-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product, Short: /my-cool-product, None: /product/123

EmailVerificationEnabled.title: Enable email address verification
EmailVerificationEnabled.description: Enables sending address verification emails to the user

EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.title: Round price during total calculation
EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.description: Enables price rounding for totals calculation in the Order and Cart modules

VirtoCommerce.Store.description: Export/Import stores with all related informations

StoreDynamicEmailNotification.description: This notification sends by email to client when he complete some form on storefront, for example contact us form
